author: Linda Collison
content: My father probably rode in one during the Guadalcanal campaign. What a good and timely invention in nautical design!

author: Willy
content:
The listing if anyone wants to see where the plaque is.

https://www.realtor.com/realestateandhomes-detail/170-Treasure-Island-Rd_Sorrento_ME_04677_M45857-02360?view=qv

author: Willy
content: There is a home on Treasure Island in Sorrento Maine that has a honorary plaque. The government awarded this plaque to Higgins industries for their part in helping win the war. Alas none of the kids are interested in it. So it will probably go with the sale of the home.
